name: Homestuck Name Generator
description: Strife! Sburb! And a whole lotta quirky names! Need a handle that's just right for your next session? Look no further, chum!
introduction: Dive headfirst into the chaotic and colorful world of Homestuck with our fantastically fun name generator! Whether you're roleplaying, creating fan content, or just trying to find your inner troll, we've got you covered. Prepare for names that are equal parts ridiculous and awesome – just like the comic itself!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button and BAM! A brand new Homestuck-inspired name appears!
Not feeling it? No sweat! Hit that button again for another shot at internet immortality.
Copy your favorite name and paste it wherever your Homestuck heart desires – forums, fanfics, or maybe even your real-life signature (we won't judge... much).
Pro Tip: Embrace the absurdity. The more ridiculous the name, the more Homestuck it is!

faqs.question: What kind of names does this generator create?
faqs.answer: Expect a wild mix of first and last names, inspired by the characters and naming conventions of Homestuck. Think quirky adjectives, random objects, and a dash of internet slang!

faqs.question: Are the names generated actually used in Homestuck?
faqs.answer: While we draw inspiration from the comic, most names are entirely new creations. Consider them a tribute to the original, not carbon copies.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my Homestuck fanfiction?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! That's what this generator is for! Go forth and populate the internet with your fantastically named characters.

faqs.question: Is this generator affiliated with Andrew Hussie or What Pumpkin?
faqs.answer: Nope! This is purely a fan-made creation, crafted with love (and a healthy dose of internet obsession) for the Homestuck community.

faqs.question: Help! I keep getting ridiculous names!
faqs.answer: That's not a bug, that's a feature! Embrace the absurdity! Ridiculousness is practically a requirement in the Homestuck universe.

faqs.question: Can I suggest prefixes or suffixes to add?
faqs.answer: We're always open to suggestions! Feel free to reach out with your ideas – who knows, maybe your suggestion will make it into the generator!
